snippet: Kawhi Leonard scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half, and the host San Antonio Spurs defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves, 104-86, for their fourth straight win.
abstract: San Antonio Spurs beat Minnesota Timberwolves, 104-86; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kawhi Leonard scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half, and the host San Antonio Spurs defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves, 104-86, for their fourth straight win.
